attack_msg:
[Your] teeth, sharp as daggers, seek to tear out a chunk of [their] midsection.
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.

[You] lunge[y] forth, bearing down on [them] with [your] vile teeth and disgusting breath.
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.

[You're] cautious at first... snapping at [them] from a distance, searching for a taste...
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.
[You] lick[y] [your] lips before bearing down on [them], and deal[y] [damage] damage.

[You] strike[y] quickly, hoping to capture an easy morsel off guard.
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.
[You] leap[y] into the air, trying to sink its teeth into [their] neck, resulting in [damage] damage.
